Godmode

An open-source python library to retrieve transaction history as debits or credits.

Supported Assets:

AVAX
BNB
BCH
BTC
BSV
DASH
DOGE
ETH
FTM
LTC
MATIC
USDT
ZEC
BEP-20 Tokens
ERC-20 Tokens

Supported Blockchains:

Avalanche
Binance Smart Chain
Ethereum
Fantom
Polygon
